text: Such an amazing tribute to an iconic movie. Jurassic park fans will absolutely enjoy this place. And children who are currently big fans of dinosaurs will love it too.

Whole universal studio Singapore is amazing Jurassic world is a part of it and it has amazing rides and food.
Brings back the nostalgia for 90s kids for sure.
it's a must-visit for anyone seeking a memorable experience in the world of dinosaurs. Don't forget to pack extra clothes to fully enjoy the water rides and ensure a comfortable visit.
Interesting dinosaurs. Big stone eggs. Nice to take pictures.  There are other better items in USS.

It's incredible adventure and funny... Many ride was there...  Be prepared clothes you will get wet... Ended up buying a rubber suit cos I didn't want to wet my cloths. Totally worth it

The Lost WorldÂ is a region in the Universal Studios Singapore. It is a theme park of Universal Studios located within Resorts World Sentosa on Sentosa Island, Singapore. The park opened on 18 March 2010. The park's name and logo were obviously taken from The Lost World: Jurassic Park...
